column1: length, swings away from outside off, and Brathwaite swats this through cover-point. It pulls up well ahead of the boundary, but they can take an easy two
fuller, swings away, and he shoulders arms
length, around off, and he goes back to defend this
width on offer this time, and he spanks this through cover-point. Much better timing on this, as it races away through the region, beating a diving point
length, around off, and he defends
closer to his body, and he defends with a shuffle across the stumps
length, outside off, turning further away, and left alone
tossed up, straighter, and he stretches out to defend
fuller, driven back to the bowler
fuller, and he presses forward to defend. A bit off the inside of the bat, but along the ground to the left of the bowler
length, outside off, left alone
fuller, straighter, driven to cover
fullish length, around off, defended
length, bowled closer to the stumps, and he shuffles across to defend towards square leg. This was bowled at 126.6 kph
full, sprayed down leg, and left alone. A touch quicker at 133.7 kph

length, and he shuffles across to defend this. Strikes him on the pads, and they go up in appeal, but it's not upheld. Bangladesh won't review this. Looked quite close to me, actually. Perhaps just going over the top
edged, but goes to the left of Liton Das and down to fine leg for four. Strays in line, this time, and Brathwaite just has to get some bat on this to make it run away
fullish, swings away, and left alone
full, just outside off and turning a bit away. Defended
short and wide, and he stands tall before cracking a cut to deep point!
full on middle and turning towards off. Big stride forward to defend
full on middle, and defended towards mid on
full, just outside off stump. Whizzes past the outside of off stump after Campbell shouldered his arms
full just outside off. Presses forward to defend. Takes the outside edge and rolls away to point
full outside off stump. A bit of movement away, and left alone
good length, just outside off. Shuffles across and nudges it square to midwicket
good length, just outside off. Tapped off the back foot
good length ball outside off and moving away. Tapped off the back foot to cover
full on off. Pitches it up, looking for away movement. Batsman shuffles across to defend with the full face of the bat, but it flies off the edge to point instead
full, just outside off stump. Defended with the turn towards the off side
tossed up on off. Big stride forward, and fended with the bat's full face
clobbered! Campbell waits for the ball that's slightly short, and is finally presented with it. Half-tracker outside off, and he goes deep inside his crease before pulling this to wide long on
full, on off stump. Big stride forward to defend
good length ball outside off. In two minds whether to leave or play. Ends up guiding it to short third man
full outside off, and he tries to drive but misses. Through to the keeper, and the caught appeal is turned down
stopped by gully! Tries to guide a shot to third man, but the fielder dives and intercepts
full, just outside off stump. Left alone
full on middle and leg. Presses forward and flicks leg side. Intercepted by short midwicket
good length outside off and zipping in towards the left-hander from around the stumps. Goes over the stumps to Liton
short, wide, in the slot to be put away but no shot offered. Jayed a bit wayward with his lines this morning
full, just outside off and angling in. Defended, with soft hands, to cover
sharp turn as this length ball on off and turns wildly into leg. Uncomfortably pulled to square leg
full just outside off stump. Defended
good length, just outside off. Cuts it square, in front of square. Man at deep point runs across the boundary to intercept
fullish, just outside off. And he cuts in front of square. Once again the deep fielders on the boundary intercept
full on middle and off. Big stride forward, and defended
full, on off stump. Big stride forward and defended
full, on off stump. Defended back to mid on
good length, on middle, and flicked to fine leg off the hips
pitches this up, inviting Campbell to drive. And he does, but it goes just past the outside edge to Liton. Collective groan from the slip cordon
full, on leg stump. Flicked to square leg
tries to go for the short length, but Jayed isn't quick enough for Campbell to be troubled at all. Rocks back, picks it off his hips, and wallops a pull over square leg for fpir

long appeal for lbw, and given! Campbell walks up to Brathwaite, a small chat, and WI review. This was a fullish ball outside off but angling in from around the stumps. Hit above the knee roll on the front leg with no bat involvement. What does ball-tracking say? That's going over leg stump! Umpire Saikat gets it wrong, and Campbell will stick around
fullish just outside off. Trning in, and fended off the back foot
good length outside off. Turning in, and Brathwaite skips behind to make some room. Cuts to deep point
full on off, and he's down on one knee to play the paddle sweep. Places it beautifully to the vacant fine-leg region for four
appeal for lbw as Campbell misses the paddle sweep. But impact was probably outside off
length ball on off, and turning into leg. Flicked off his hips to square leg
fullish, on off and turning in. Flicked one-bounce to short leg under the helemt

good length ball from around the stumps. Wide outside off and punched off the back foot through the covers. Two fielders from inside the circle give it a chase, and manage to drag it back just before the boundary line
full, just outside off and angling in. Small stride forward to defend
full just outside off stump. Big stride forward, but then shoulders his arms
good length, just outside off. Wants to cut but too close to his body. Mistimes it towards cover
full just outside off. Smothers it with a front-foot defense
defends with soft hands
full on middle. And defended
full on off and middle. Big stride forward and blocked
full, on off. Caresses a drive back to Nayeem
good length, on middle. Goes to the back foot, and flicks leg side
full on middle and off. Drives to mid off
wow! Full, slow in the air, lands in the slot. Campbell commits, goes forward, stretches out, and sways a six over long on
full, from around the stumps on middle. Defended along the ground
full on middle. Jams his bat down to defend, flies off the inside edge and goes just past the fielder at short leg!
full on middle and off. Defends it firmly to mid off. Overstepped
full on off stump. Big stride forward and defended
full on middle. Defended, big stride, back to the bowler
overpitched on off, and defended off the front foot
fullish ball, with the round-arm wide of the crease. Ball straightens after pitching and he backs away before cutting to point
fullish, on off. Punched off the back foot towards the on side

shouts of catch it but that's probably for the ball boy at long on. Gets to the pitch of this full ball with a big stride and hammers a shot over the bowler's head. Clears mid on, and that's four more
full on middle. Mistimes a drive to mid on
good length, on off. Defended
full on middle and leg. Smothers a drive towards midwicket
good length just outside off. Gets close to the ball, and fends off the back foot
gets to fifty partnership in style! Full, just outside off. Skips down the wicket and plays it over Taijul's head. Hard hit, and runs to the long-off boundary
fullish, on off. Flicked to the leg side
full on middle and leg. Thumps it to wide long on with the straight bat
fullish, on off. And turning inwards. Fended to short leg
full, on off stump. Thumped to long on, who runs to his right and dives to intercept
full on off. Strides forward and defends. Looks like that's drinks.
short in length, and he can go back and punch to cover
fuller, driven towards point with an open face of the bat
fuller, straighter, driven towards mid-on. Stopped by Mominul Haque, who is stationed at a short mid-on
goes back, and defends one that pitches around off and straightens from there
straighter, driven towards the bowler
short, goes back to cut this to point
length, and he goes back to defend
presses forward to smother one around off
full, pushed wide of mid-off, and they go through for the single
length, and he goes back to defend this, with the turn into him
fuller, wider, and he defends after covering the line
length, and he goes back to defend. Fired in a touch quicker, but he was alive to that
length, goes back to punch this towards short midwicket
fuller, outside off, and he goes back to drive this towards extra cover
fullish length, presses forward to defend a straighter ball
length, goes back to defend this. Bowled at 86.9 kph
lap sweep again, fetched from outside off. Long leg gets around to his left to reel it in
length, presses forward to defend one
punches a length ball, pitching outside off, towards deep mid-off
length, goes back and glides this with the turn. On the bounce to short leg
down the wicket, and chips a length ball towards long on
length, presses forward to defend
fuller, and he drives this towards long-on
length, but turning across him, and he works this off his pads towards fine leg. They will pick two for this
length, just around off, and driven firmly back towards the bowler
length, goes back and across to work it away towards square leg
length, and he goes back to cut this away towards deep backward point
too full, around leg and middle, and driven towards deep mid-on
straighter, defends with a forward press
length, defended off the back foot
length, goes back to defend
presses forward to defend one that turns into him
fuller, straighter, driven towards mid-wicket

has he fallen to the sweep again? Fullish delivery, and he looks to sweep. Loud appeal, and given, but Campbell has reviewed. The line was outside off, turning back in, and he took on the sweep despite this being a fairly full ball. It has definitely passed close to bat, but if there's no inside edge on this, he could be in trouble. UltraEdge seems to indicate a very fine tickle, actually. It might just be the general disturbance with the noise from the sweep. That's what the umpire thinks, and it's three reds on ball tracking. Bangladesh have that breakthrough
length, defends with a forward press
length, tossed up a bit outside off, and he drives this through covers. Played with some authority!
length, around off, defended
fullish, around off, driven back to the bowler
length, driven towards short mid-on
length, goes back and drives this out towards deep point
defends off the back foot
driven back towards the bowler, with a lovely forward press and swing of the blade
length, presses forward to defend
stretches forward to defend one around off
presses forward to defend one around off
driven to the left of mid-off, and they pinch a single
defends with a forward press
length, driven with the turn towards mid-on
length, and he goes back to punch this towards deep point
length, around off, and he presses forward to defend
length, defends with a forward press
fullish, and he drives it back to the bowler
defends with forward press
drives it with the turn towards mid-off
length, goes back to punch this wide of Mominul Haque at cover. He gets to the ball, but can't gather properly, and ends up conceding a single
worked with the turn towards square leg. There's decent spin on offer, though slow enough to allow the batsmen to adjust
length, presses forward to defend
fuller, and he presses to defend. Runs off the edge after turning across him, and goes towards third man. Still slow, but there is good turn on this one
length, goes back and drills this towards sweeper cover
length, worked away with the spin towards square leg
fuller, around off and middle, worked with the turn to square leg

goes back, allows the ball to turn across him from off and middle, and works it away towards fine leg. Superb timing on this. Diving stop attempted by Mithun, running in from square leg, but he seems to have touched the boundary rope as he puts it back in play
length, and he rocks back to drive this towards sweeper cover
length, and he presses forward to defend
presses forward to smother one around off
length, and he presses forward to defend towards cover
defends with a forward press
full, spins well across from outside off, and he leaves
length, and he defends with a forward press
fuller, but he still goes back to drive this towards point
full, around off, and he stretches forward to defend
full, outside off, and he leaves
just around off, and he shuffles across to defend
length, and he gets a big stride forward to defend one. Angle around off, nipping back in a touch
down the pads, and he works it away towards long leg
just a tad short in length, and he goes back to punch this towards wide mid-off
length, outside off, swinging further away, and he drops his wrists with a flourish as he leaves it
length, around off, and he defends from the crease
length, and he goes back to defend
length, angles across him and then straightens. He goes back to defend
fuller, and he presses a touch forward to defend
defends with a little press back towards mid-wicket
length, goes back to pat this as it turns into him
goes back to defend one around off
Jayed to start off, over the stumps. Good length ball just outside off, and punched to cover off the back foot
full, just outside off stump. Gets onto the front foot, and taps it back to Jayed
overpitched, outside off stump. Left alone by Brathwaite
full on off, a bit of movement in the air. Brathwaite shuffles across to work it through midwicket. But it goes off the bat's face to cover instead
overpitched, outside off. Brathwaite shuffles across, covers the off stump, and then shoulders his arms
full on middle and leg. Goes across the stumps and nudges it off his pads to fine leg
full, just outside off stump. Smothered down the ground to long on
full on off stump, from around the stumps. Turning slightly away, and defended
full on middle and leg. Defends it off the front foot
overpitched, a bit of dip, and lands just outside off. Defended towards the off side
full just outside off stump, and blocked away to the off side
good length, outside off. Rocks back and cuts in front of square. Protection in the deep though
around the stumps to Moseley. Good length ball just outside off and angling inwards. Fended off the back foot
overpitched, just outside off. Bends his knees, and brings out the square drive. Straight to point
fullish on off, and moving into middle. Keeps his right leg out of the ball's line to avoid the lbw, and defends back to Jayed
full, on off and angling in. Flicked to midwicket while coming forward
full, just outside off. Shuffling forward and blocked confidently towards cover
sharp turn! Good length on off and spinning in. Brathwaite skips towards the leg side, and mistimes a cut towards the on side
full on off. Defended off the front foot
length ball, turning in, Turned away to square elg
good length just outside off. Wants to cut, so makes room, thinking it will turn. But goes straight through, so misses
full, just outside off. Strides forward, and blocks
full ball, originating on middle and off but swinging into leg. Tries to flick, misses, hits the front leg. Tiny lbw appeal, but everyone knew that's going down the leg side

chases a wide ball and inside-edged onto the stumps! This will disappoint Moseley immensely. Full and wide, and Moseley wants to chase at this. Looks to drive, and the ball takes an inside edge before crashing into leg stump. Grossly out of balance. Out after a 38-ball resistance
beautiful one to welcome the new man! Full, just outside off stump. A bit of swing away and he wants to defend. But the ball goes just past the outside edge.
full on middle and leg. Smothered to mid on
overpitched outside off, nearly a yorker. Dug away to cover
fullish, just outside off. Pokes at it, and edges it towards gully, who dives to his left to intercept
fullish, just outside off from the new bowler in his first delivery. Makes room and cuts in front of square
fullish on off and angling in. Backs away and cuts again
overpitched on off. Driven gently along the ground, past the non-striker to long on
full outside off, an bit quicker this time. Hits the rough outside off and turns sharply away. Left alone
full outside off, and Bonner looks to drive! Late to the shot, and the extra bounce/turn makes him miss it altogether
full, on off. Presses forward and defends to cover
length ball, on off and angling in. Worked off his hips to square leg, off the back foot
overpitched, just outside off. Presses forward and plays a confident on-drive. Can't beat mid on though
overpitched outside off, and he drills a drive to mid off. Looks like he's hurt a finger on the right hand trying to drive. Looks like a shock on the bat handle after the ball hit the bat
yorker length, on middle and leg. Closes the bat's face and guides it to deep backward square leg
fullish, just outside off. Fluent drive, but straight to cover. The infield on the off side is quite packed
good length, just outside off. Stands tall to punch, and bisects the gap between cover point and cover. Gets off the mark
full, on off. Lunges forward to block
full outside off. Turns slightly away. He shoulders his arms
fullish, just outside off. Big stride forward to defend
full, just outside off. Check-drives to cover
full, just outside off. In two minds whether to defend towards cover or with the straight bat. Tentatively nudges it towards the non-striker at the last moment
overpitched on middle. Blocked back towards the bowler
good length dibbly-dobbly bowling this shall be. Punched off the back foot to cover
good length outside off. Bit of seam movement away. Opens the bat's face and cuts to deep point
good length, just outside off. Punches to short cover
good length ball outside off, and he drives off the back foot to the sweeper-fielder in the deep
full on the stumps on this occasion. Closes the bat's face and works it to midwicket
fullish, on off stump. Lunges forward to block with soft hands
full, just outside off stump. Defended off the front foot
good length, on off and turning away. Gently pokes at it, sending it past short cover past silly mid off
full on middle. Down on one knee, quick to pick the length. And swept one bounce for four. Classy
full just outside off. Driven towards cover
length ball on off. Backs away and confidently cuts this with the horizontal bat past the fielder at point! Team hundred
good length, on off. Goes onto the back foot and punches to cover
fullish, just outside off. Pokes at it, and mistimes the check-punch-drive to cover
good length just outside off. Some extra bounce and he fends off the back foot
full, just outside off stump. Shuffles across, fends it back to Sarkar
fullish, on off stump. Presses forward to defend
good length, just outside off. Worked off his pads to square leg
defends this with soft hands
good length, just outside off. Shuffles onto the back foot. Cut in front of square
length ball stump to stump. Worked off his hips to the leg side
full on off. Giant lunge forward to block
fullish just outside off. Goes onto the back foot, changing the length slightly. And cut to extra cover
full on off stump. Defended off the front foot. Soft hands
full on leg stump, and nudged away to midwicket

golden arm! And that's a great catch in the slips. Brathwaite is shell shocked. Can't believe he's given his wicket in this manner. Length ball, just outside off. Tries to cut, but flies off the edge. Keeper dives to his right, but Shanto - at first slip - keeps his eyes on the ball, and pockets the catch. Falls three short of his fifty
around the stumps, length ball wide outside off. Left alone
full, just outside off stump. Check drives to cover
off the mark in style! Punched off the back foot, and this races away to the cover boundary
good length, just outside off. Punched towards cover
good length, on off and angling across from over the stumps. Surprises the batsman with some extra bounce as he drops his hands at the last second. Whizzes over the gloves to Liton, the keeper
full, on middle. Big stride forward to defend back to the bowler
full, on off stump. Presses forward to defend
full, on middle and leg. Offers the full face of the bat. Driven to mid on
full, on off stump. Presses forward and blocks to cover
full, on off. Defended with soft hands to the off side
full on middle and leg. Lunges forward, and blocks it towards the off side
good length, on middle stump. Fends it with soft hands, off the back foot
good length, just outside off. He shuffles across to cover his stumps before shouldering his arms. Nice carry to the keeper
overpitched, outside off stump. Through to Liton with the batsman offering no shot
full outside off stump, quite wide in fact. Almost over the tram-lines. Through to the keeper
full outside off stump. Shoulders his arms again, allowing the ball to go through to the keeper. Not chasing at the ball not in his area

small appeal for caught behind but that's mostly excitement. Length ball, on middle and angling towards off. He looks to defend off the back foot but the ball whizzes past the edge into Liton's gloves. Time for drinks
fuller ball, almost a yorker, dug out back towards the bowler
presses forward to defend one closer to the bat

fuller, and he makes a bit of room by clearing his front leg, and dropping this straight back over the bowler's head. Gave a full view of the stumps, but picks this up on length. Just short of the boundary
length, defends with a forward press, towards silly mid-off
drives a length ball towards cover
presses forward to defend one around off
length, punched away towards cover
back of a length, and he works this wide of point for a quick single
length, around off, and he shapes to defend
fullish, outside off, left alone. This was bowled at 121.2 kph
full, but on the pads, and he works this away towards fine leg. Tried to deliver this from wide of the crease
length, way outside off, and he can leave this alone
full, worked away towards mid-on
length, and he goes back to defend
length, presses forward to defend this. Shapes in with the angle from around the wicket
length, and he defends with a little forward movement
length, straighter around off and middle, and he drives to Mushfiqur Rahim at deep mid-off
fuller, turns quite sharply after pitching. Mayers shapes to drive, and it skews off the inside of the bat, just wide of short leg.
length, outside off, and he drives this. A bit uppish, but bounces on its way through to point
short, and he goes back to punch this through point. There's cover in the deep and that allows them a single
fullish length, but down the pads. Worked away towards square leg
length, around off, and he plays a beautiful drive. Towards mid-off

that's a big wicket for Bangladesh! Abu Jayed pitches it up, and a touch wide. Perhaps a hint of swing away from the left-hander, and Mayers cannot help but have a nibble. Looks to drive, finds the outside edge, and Soumya Sarkar takes a good, sharp catch at wide slip. West Indies in a spot of bother now, in no more than a blink of an eye
length, just around off, and he leaves. Bowled at 128 kph
fullish, and driven towards deep mid-off. They set off for the single, and make it comfortably
full, darted in towards the pads, and worked away through midwicket to get him off the mark
length, presses forward to defend
fuller, straighter, blocked back down the wicket
length, and he stretches forward to defend. Line outside off
length, and he presses forward to defend
fullish length, around off, driven to short extra cover, who is in place now
length, around off, and he gets behind the line to defend
length, presses forward to defend one around off
fullish length, driven towards mid-off
shorter, outside off, and left alone
fullish, wide outside off, and he leaves
fullish, around off, and he drives this cover. There's a sweeper in the deep for him
length, presses forward to meet this
length, angles in from wide of the crease. Defended with a forward press
tossed up, around off. Presses forward to defend
length, works it off the back foot past short leg, but cannot beat Mominul Haque at square leg
length, straight line, and he defends with a forward press
fullish, straight onto the stumps, and he drives this towards mid-off. Bowled at 126.9 kph
length, and he defends with a little poke from the crease. Into the ground, and rolls on to the off side
short, outside off, and whipped away through the mid-wicket region off the back foot
length, wide outside off. Ignored
fuller, around off, driven towards mid-off
fuller, driven back down the wicket. Fielded by mid-on, converging to his left with mid-off
fullish length, around leg, straightening from there, and he defends
fullish, tossed up a touch more in terms of pace, and he drives this to long-off
flat, around the stumps, and defended from the crease
length, presses forward to defend
length, and he defends with a forward press. Drops just short of silly mid-off
goes back to defend one angling into him from wide of the crease
length, around off, a bit of swing back in, and he defends from the crease
good length, well outside off, though. He can leave this alone
length, and he goes back to punch towards cover
length, angles in, and he works this towards short mid-wicket, off the back foot
length, presses a touch forward to defend
length, works it off his hips as it slants in, and gets four down to fine leg. Long leg has a long way to move across to his right, and this outfield is very quick!
length, around off, and he defends with a forward press
fuller, around off, driven back to the bowler
fullish, around off, and he drives through extra cover. Cover goes chasing behind, and he is able to prevent the boundary
length, and he goes back to defend
some sharp turn, from around off, and he goes back to defend
length, and he goes back to defend
length, outside off, driven towards wide cover
length, around off, and he nurdles this wide of gully. They pinch a quick single
length, and he goes back to punch this towards cover. A bit uppish, but lands short of the fielder
full, down the leg side, and it strikes him on the pad, even as the bat jams down. Loud appeal, but not given leg before, also because this was heading way down leg
fuller length, around off, and he drives down the ground, to the right of mid-off
wide of the crease, angles back in from outside off, and he goes back to defend
length, works this with the turn after going back and across, towards square leg
length, presses forward to defend
fuller, driven down the ground with the turn towards long-on
length, goes back to defend this, punching it back to the bowler
presses forward to defend a length ball around off
quicker through the air, and he defends
length, around off, and he defends with a forward press
length, and he hangs back to drive this towards deep point
fullish length, driven towards mid-on
fuller, around middle and leg, worked away towards short mid-wicket
full, but on the pads, and this time he has whipped it away through the vacant deep mid-wicket region. Just a touch too full, but a good idea from Sarkar
full again, and he drills this past mid-on for another four. What a confident finish to this session from the West Indies batsmen
good length on off, and turning into leg. Flicked
full, on off stump. Pushed to short mid on
full on off. Driven down the ground, and mid off runs across to intercvept. Through to long on
full, overpitched just outside off stump. Caressed to mid off
good length just outside off. Turning into off. Punched to mid on
good length on off. Defended off the back foot to mid on
good length, outside off. Hammered off the back foot, in front of point for four. Half-tracker put away and that's the team 150
full, on off stump. Pushed to mid off from the front foot
comes from wide of the crease. Full, almost a yorker, on middle. Defended
good length, just outside off. Poked towards cover point, and off they go for one
full, on off stump. Defended with soft hands to the bowler
full on off stump. Flicked to deep backward square leg
full, just outside off and turning in. Defended with soft hands
full just outside off stump. Pushed to mid off
full outside off stump. Comes down the ground to mid on
full on off stump. Defended, back to the bowler
full on off stump. Drilled to long on
good length ball, loopy delivery, some extra bounce. Punched to mid on
full and wide. Loose ball first up, and clobbered off the front foot to the extra cover fence!
good length, outside off. Rocks back, and cuts against the turn to deep point
full, on off from around the stumps. Blocked to cover
good length just outside off. Pokes at it, and guided towards short third man
full, on off, from over the stumps. Defended back
fullish, outside off. Ball stays a bit low. Poked towards the off side
full on middle. Turning into leg. And flicked to square leg
full, on off stump. Lunges forward and defends to mid on
full outside off stump. And defended towards cover
good length, on off. And defended off the back foot to mid on
tossed up on middle. Blocked with the turn to short midwicket
full on middle. Worked off his toes to square leg
full, on off. Defended with soft hands to the leg side
full on middle and leg. Wants to work it leg side, hits the front pad
fullish, on middle. Tapped to square leg, and they scurry across for one run
good length, on middle. Worked off his hips to square leg
full, on off stump. Flicked to short mid on
full and wide outside off. Smacks it, but mistimes the drive to cover
good length just outside off. Turning in, rocks back and punched to mid on off the back foot
good length, on middle and leg. Nudged off the turn to square leg
good length, just outside off stump. Defended off the back foot
good length, just outside off stump. Turning in, and fended off the back foot to Mehidy
full on middle, and flicked to deep midwicket
good length, on middle stump. Nudged off the pads to square leg
good length on middle and leg. Flicked to square leg, but no run
full, on off stump. Defended to mid on
full, just outside off and turning in. Defended
full on middle. Worked off his toes to midwicket
full, wider outside off. Tries to drive, and takes the outside edge, and races away to third man for four! They'll take it
full on middle and leg. Closes the bat's face and nudges it to square leg
full on middle and leg. Worked off his pads to the leg side
full on off and angling across from around the stumps. Defended to mid on
full on middle and leg. Worked to midwicket, with the bat's closed face
full, just outside off stump. Presses forward, defends to cover
full on middle and leg. Nudged to midwicket
full on middle and leg stump. Defended
