fired in quick, and he defends
good length, just outside off stump. Tapped back to the bowler
top edged and this goes to fine leg for four! Soumya goes for a 120kph short ball, and he swivels to pull in front of square. Mistimed and goes fine. Well, there was a fielder at deep backward square
fullish, on off. Drives along the ground, past the umpire, to long on
full, on off. A bit wobbly in the air. Flicks off his pads to deep backward square
fullish, just outside off. Comfortable pace for him to drive. Mistimes it to wide long on
back of a length, outside off. Drags a pull to deep midwicket
full outside off. Driven against the turn to cover

long on does not attack! Full outside off, and turning away. Joseph looks to drag it from beyond the stumps. And mistimes the slog towards the leg side. Not timed well enough, and thus short of long on. But perhaps the fielder could've attacked a bit more. Da Silva has a chat with Joseph
full outside off. Pushed to mid on

another batsman out in the nineties! This is a full ball on off, and goes straight on with the arm. Da Silva looks to defend with the straight bat, but the ball goes between bat and pad, and hits middle stump. That's Taijul's 100th Test scalp in Bangladesh. Da Silva prods back to the dressing room in ultra-slow pace, a sign of how disappointed he is. The management is applauding him though
full, on off. Presses forward, drives to mid off
full on middle. Defended with the straight bat to the leg side
good length, just outside off stump. Defended
full on off, and he caresses an on drive to long on
fullish, just outside off. Defends, ball rolls away to deep extra cover
short ball, outside off, and he pulls it over deep square leg! There were four fielders in the deep on the leg side, so he knew the short ball is coming. Great swivel, even better timing.
gloved this time, over the keeper's left for four. Jayed goes short again, Joseph is tempted to pull, and this time a bit of luck going his way

and he falls to the trap. After a lot of smart batting, Joseph falls into the plan Bangladesh have done. Back of a length, outside off, and Joseph swipes leg side once again. Takes an edge, and easy catch for Liton. Out four short of his highest Test score. This was a gift, of sorts, to Bangladesh. Applause for Joseph from the team management nonetheless
full on middle. Defended back to the bowler
good length, outside off. Rocks back and punches to mid off
fullish, just outside off and turning away. Tapped to point
full, on off stump. Defended
full on middle and leg. Pushes at it, with soft hands, in front of the fielder at forward short leg

past the outside edge and the keeper whips the bails off! We're going to the TV umpire. This was a full, fast ball on off and turning across the bat as Cornwall misses the drive. But his toes are grounded
full outside off, and he's early into the drive. Sliced past point, and the man at deep extra cover has plenty of work to do to stop the four

that's his fourth! Full, just outside off stump. He pokes at it, and it takes the outside edge. Another simple one for Liton. Warrican playing inside the line of the ball, and Jayed is one short of a five-for
good length, on off. Defended firmly
bursts through the bowler's hands! Full, outside off and he smashes it straight. Bowler can't get a hand to it, past mid off, and that's West Indies' 400
good length, outside off. Slices this off the back foot to deep point. Man at deep extra cover runs across, and puts the dive in, but unfortunately he can't stop it
short ball just outside off. He sways away from the ball's line
full just outside off. Square drive to point
full on middle. Flicked off the pads to square leg
fullish, just outside off. Pushed past short mid off to the off side
drags this short, on middle and leg. Punched off the back foot to long on
full on off. Defends, and flies off the face to silly mid off. Falls short of him though
good length, on off stump. Defended
full, just outside off. Punched off the back foot to cover
good length angling into off stump. Flicked towards wide long on
full outside off. Gabriel looks to drive uppishly over cover. Misses the connection
slower ball, loopy. Lands at a yorker length, just outside off. Gabriel brings his bat down late, and gets no connection. Through to Liton. This was a back-of-the-hand delivery
short ball, on middle, and he ducks under it. Through to the keeper
good length, just outside off stump. Defended off the back foot to the bowler
good length, on middle. Punched down the ground to long on
holes out at long on as he goes deep to pull, but hits it over the non-striker to the fielder in the deep. That's Taijul's fourth and West Indies are all out for 409
back of a length, defended towards point off the back foot

wide of the crease, angles way down leg, and he flicks it off his legs. Shouts of 'Catch it' but this has been played wide of long leg. Alzarri Joseph does well to quickly go across to his right and cut this off
length, angles into him, and he defends from the crease
length, and he hangs back to defend. Goes off the toe-end of the bat, and drops by his feet. Some encouragement from the West Indies fielders
length, drives this off the back foot, but cannot beat backward point

there's the early breakthrough, and it is good captaincy from Brathwaite! Uppish drive to one that slants into him, and his feet haven't really gone anywhere, and neither has his weight. Played towards short mid-wicket, and gleefully accepted
length, driven towards cover
wider, driven firmly, but cannot beat wide cover
pushed through a bit flat, outside off, left alone
tossed up, driven back towards the bowler
down the wicket, and lofted back over the bowler's head. All the way for six, but I dare say, West Indies won't mind this at all
length, presses forward to smother this around off
length, around off, and he presses forward and eases this past mid-off. Lovely timing on this from Shanto

edged, and taken at gully! This was put wider by Gabriel, and Shanto has had a swipe at it. This was much wider of him than the previous ball, and his feet don't go anywhere. Flies off the edge through to gully, where Bonner takes a sharp catch
length, around off, and he defends towards point
short, around off, climbing in towards his face, and he does well to play it with loose hands. Patted down near his feet
just a bit back of a length, sizzles past his chest at 142 kph, and he takes his arms away from the line of the ball to evade it
fullish length, defended from the crease as it slants into him
fullish length, around the pads, and he whips this away. Not far away from short leg, to his right, as deep square leg fields
short, and he goes right back to defend this
fuller, but down the leg side. Mominul lets this pass through
length, driven towards deep mid-wicket
how close was that! Just back of a length, slanting across and Mominul is looking to take his bat out of the way. It hits the blade, and bounces close to the stumps. He's safe, though
length, worked away towards point with a defensive push
full, on the pads, and worked away towards deep midwicket. Picks up two, as Mayers runs around from deep square leg to pull this back from the fence
length, and he defends towards cover
length, straighter in line, and he gets right behind the line of this to defend
full, but way down leg side. Tamim looks to whip it away, but cannot lay bat on it. Good take by Da Silva
short, and he dabs this towards point. Takes off for a quick single, and they make it quite comfortably in the end
fullish length, perhaps an attempt at a change in pace, but goes too straight. Mominul punches down the ground and picks up a single to the right of mid-on
short, angles across him from leg, and he gets up on his toes to work this along the ground towards long leg
length, around off, defended towards point off the back foot
fullish length, angles across him, and he leaves
uppish, but guided past second slip. Short in length, and stays on the pitch long enough to allow Tamim enough time to open the face of his bat and run it down to third man

full, around his pads, and he works this through the gap between mid-on and deep mid-wicket. Superb timing on this from Tamim, who seems to have reasoned that it's best to counter-attack, when given the slightest room
defends with a forward press
fired in a touch quick, and he goes back to defend. Struck on the pads, but sliding down leg
goes back to cut one, to point
flatter, cut away to point again
flat again, and he has ample time to go back and defend
fuller, wider, and smeared through the off side, but fielded at extra cover
presses forward to smother one around off
length, angles across him, and he leaves
length, defended towards point
full, but wide of off, and he smacks this through the extra cover region. Offered width, and he makes the most of it
short of a length, angles across him, and he gets up on one leg, and cuts this away. Fierce, and ominous!
back of a length, around leg, and he defends
good ball! Zips across him from a length as he shapes to get behind the line and defend. Beats the outside edge of the bat as it goes through to Da Silva
length, and he looks to dab this away towards point
presses forward to defend
angles in with the arm, and he works this away towards deep square leg
length, defends with a forward press
presses forward to defend one around off
works this with the angle towards short midwicket
back of a length, and he hops to defend this
short, and he guides this over the slips cordon. Easy pickings, because the short balls, when banged into the centre of the pitch, are just sitting up a touch
short again, and he guides this down to third man again. The difference was this was along the ground. Again through that vacant third slip region
short, angles across him, but starts well wide of off, and he leaves
short, closer to the body, and he ducks under this one to evade it
short, down the leg side a touch, and he allows this to go through
length, stretches forward to defend
fired in quicker, and he pushes forward to defend
length, defended with a forward press
fuller, driven towards the bowler

flatter, and he plays back. Down the leg side, and he is able to guide it down towards fine leg. Long leg has a fair distance to cover to cut this off, and they can pick up a third with some hard running
fuller, gets a big stride ahead to defend this
length, but far wide of off. Tamim lets it pass
fullish, around off, and he leaves after seeing the line of the ball, delivered from well wide of the crease
works a straighter ball, angled in on a length, towards long leg
length, around off, defended with a little hop
good, short ball! Pitched around off, and just kept climbing. Mominul shapes to get out of the way, and it passes very close to his throat
short, down the leg side, and he is able to get some bat on this. Runs it past Da Silva
short in length, wide of off, and he leaves
length, presses forward to defend
length, presses forward to defend
fired in a touch quicker, and he presses forward to defend again
skips down the wicket, and smothers one around off
fired in quick, and he defends from the crease
length, worked off his hips towards deep backward square leg
length, around off, driven back towards the bowler, who gets down low to his right to stop it
fuller length, driven on the up, and past mid-on. Shouts of 'catch it', but he placed it to the right of the fielder there
length, worked away off his pads through the midwicket region. Just keeps running away from mid-on, who goes chasing after

edged, but just short of Cornwall at first slip. In fact, he does well to get some hand on it and prevent a third successive boundary. Length ball, angles away, and he meets it with soft hands. Well played by Tamim, actually
length, angles away, and he leaves
full, on the pads, and clipped away through deep backward square leg. A controlled shot from Mominul, who stayed on the back foot and just guided it away, using the pace on the ball
length, defended towards point
length, and he presses forward. Off the inner edge, but past short leg, towards square leg
length, goes back to defend one around off
fuller, defended with a forward press
length, cut away, but fielded at point
length, goes back to defend

that's the wicket! Fired in a touch wider, and Mominul cannot resist having a drive at it. Fine edge, and a great take by Da Silva. This pitch has some extra bounce, especially as compared to Chattogram, and that has come in handy for the bowler!
length, around off, defended towards cover with a forward press
just a bit short, and he has blazed this away through point. Deep backward point gets across to his left, and is able to keep it down to two
length, around off. He taps it down by his feet on the off side. Wants a single, but quickly sent back by Mushfiqur Rahim
back of a length, straighter in line, and he defends after getting behind the line

Tamim is gone too! It's a good length ball, and Tamim has plonked his front foot and then looked to flick this away through midwicket. Just skews it a bit, and it goes towards short midwicket, where Moseley accepts the catch gleefully
full on middle. Defended firmly, to mid on
full just outside off stump. Defended back to Cornwall
full on off. Flicks with the turn to deep midwicket
full, just outside off stump. Presses forward and defends
full, just outside off stump. Defended
full on off stump. Dug away, to short midwicket
full, on his toes, and flicked behind square on this occasion. Fine leg runs to his left, covering a fair distance, to stop the four
good length ball on the fourth-stump channel. Defended off the back foot
fullish, just outside off stump. Left alone
full on middle and leg. Defended to short midwicket
back of a length, just outside off. Drops his gloves and sways wa from the ball's line
fullish, just outside off stump. Defended towards cover
full, on off stump. Defended with soft hands
full, just a little wider. Turning in. Worked leg side
good length outside off. Bit of extra bounce as Rahim blocks after shuffling towards off stump
full, just outside off stump. Defended
full, on middle. Nudged towards leg side
full, just outside off. Wants to work it leg side but leading edge runs it down to mid off instead
good length, outside off and angling into off. Some extra bounce. Defends with soft hands, and the ball takes the edge before rolling away to point

taken down the leg side! And umpire Sharfudoullah raises his finger. Mithun reviews though. This was a short ball, cramping in for space as it goes down the leg side. Mithun looks to flick, and the ball touches something before going to the keeper, who dives to his left. But that's a poor umpiring decision since there was no bat involved. It touched his hip. Good review
good length, just outside off. Left alone
back of a length outside off. No shot offered, nice carry to Da Silva
back of a length, on off. This time he ducks under the line. Through to Da Silva
good length outside off. Turning in. Skips to the leg side before cutting to point

falls safe! Full, just outside off. Down on one knee, and swept! Top-edged over square leg, but falls just away from the deep backward square fielder. They come back for the extra run, and the keeper might have inflicted a run out. Replays, though, show that Mithun was well in. An action-packed delivery
full, just outside off. Driven with the turn to long on
full just outside off stump. Caresses a drive to long on
good length, just outside off stump. Extra bounce, forcing him to miss the cut. Nice take by Da Silva
good length, a bit wider outside off. Left alone
good length, just outside off stump. Shuffles across and blocks with soft hands, from near his chest
full on middle and leg. Flicked, off his pads, to fine leg for one
full on middle and leg. Defended back to Joseph
fullish, on middle and leg. Pushed towards the non-striker
full, on off stump. Presses forward, blocks with soft hands
good length, just outside off. Sways away, through to the keeper
fullish, just outside off. Medium pace goes through to Da Silva
good length, just outside off. Pokes it to point. Mithun wants a run, but Rahim sends him back
full, on off stump. Flicked to short midwicket. Picks up swiftly and aims a throw at the batsman's end since he was just outside his crease
good length, just outside off. Shuffles across and defends
glorious! Full, outside off. Down on one knee and stylishly thumps a cover drive for four
full, just a little wider outside off. This time he does not drive. Left alone
good length, on middle. Defended off the back foot to midwicket with soft hands
full, on middle. Tapped with the bat's closed face to square leg. Fielder runs across, dives and ensures there's no single on offer
full just outside off stump. Opens the bat's face, stretches forward, and fends to cover point
full, outside off, and he drills a drive. Cover dives, parries it away to mid off
good length, on middle stump. Goes down the leg side to the keeper
full, just outside off but angling in. He wants to drive, big gap left between bat and body. Goes between the gap, and on the bounce to Da Silva
full, on off stump. He presses forward and defends to the leg side
good length, just outside off. Defended
full, just outside off stump. Presses forward to defend
good length, just outside off. Sticks the bat out, and pokes it away to point
length ball just outside off. Shoulders his arms to the keeper
back of a length, outside off stump. He shuffles across and shoulders his arms
good length, just outside off. Rides the bounce, and pokes it towards point. Soft hands the key
nice carry! Good length ball outside off stump. Allows the ball to go through to Da Silva
full outside off stump. Drives to cover, who intercepts to stop the single
full, on off and searing into the stumps. Defends off the back foot
good length ball on middle and leg. Goes down the leg side. Keeper shuffles to his right to intercept
fullish, just outside off. No shot offered
fullish, on middle stump. He comes forward to block. Mushfiqur plays it with soft hands knowing short cover is lurking
full, on off stump. Defended. This one has been defended from near his chest
full, on leg stump, and whipped for four. Bit of swing into the pads, and he uses it to his advantage
guides this, with the bowler offering width, to deep point. Fielder at deep point runs across to stop the second run
good length ball outside off stump. Defends with soft hands, staying on the back foot
full ball, delivered from wide of the crease. Zipping into his toes, and flicked to deep midwicket
yorker ish, just outside off. Dug away to cover
short ball, on middle and leg. He ducks and gets under it
goes for the short ball, angling in, but it doesn't bounce as much. Works it off his hips to deep backward square
good length, on off stump. Defended, and it takes the outside edge to point. Quicker delivery, 141kph. Batsman says no for the run
full, just outside off stump. A bit of movement inwards, and Rahim shuffles across to cover his stumps before shouldering his arms
ooo! That goes just past the edge. Full, on off and seaming away after hitting the deck. Mithun looks to defend for the ball angling into middle stump, but it goes the other direction
full on off. Bit of movement into his pads, and nudged to midwicket for a quick single
full, just outside off, and blocked away to the off side
full, on off stump. Defended after pressing forward
flicks this off his pads, using the delivery's angle, to fine leg
fullish, just outside off stump. Goes poking at it, but then pulls the bat back enough for it to not take the edge to the wicketkeeper
good length outside off and turning away. Punched off the back foot to cover
good length, outside off. Skips and cuts, but straight to point
good length, just outside off. Played off the back foot to cover point. He's overstepped
good length, outside off. Opens the bat's face, off the back foot, and plays it to point
full, on middle stump. Defends after a big lunge forward
half-tracker on middle and leg. Goes deep in the crease before pulling along the ground for four
tosses it up, overpitched outside off. Drills a drive, but can't beat cover
overpitched on the fourth-stump channel. Hammers a drive, but intercepted by short cover
good length outside off. Bit of seam movement away. Cut to point
full, just outside off. Pushes at it, gets the gap between cover point and mid off. Protection in the deep though
good length, on off and angling into middle and leg. Stands tall and fends off the back foot
good length, on off. Shuffles across in front of off stump before blocking off the back foot
fullish, just outside off stump. Fended gently towards short cover
full, on off and pushed towards cover. Fielder runs to his right, stopping the single
full, just outside off. Big lunge forward to defend to the off side
good length, outside off. Skids through, and he punches through the off side to the sweeper-fielder on the boundary
good length outside off. Bit of turn away, and cut in front of square. Throw from the deep from Bonner is wayward, allows them to take the second
full on off stump. Gets onto the front foot to defend
tossed up on middle. Drives along the ground to the bowler
good length outside off stump. Through to the keeper with no turn and no shot offered
full, outside off and turning in a bit. Lunges forward to defend, but inside-edged onto his pad
full just outside off. Defended towards cover with soft hands
full, outside off. Checks a drive to the off side. Stopped by cover
full outside off. Skids through as he looks to defend for a ball that would turn. Past his bat
full, just outside off stump. Defended off the front foot
full on middle and off. Driven to mid on
good length on off. Skids back into middle. Goes onto the back foot to defend
full outside off. Caresses a drive to cover
tossed up, dips late. Plays a drive comfortably to Bonner at deep extra cover. Minimal footwork though, trusting his hand-eye co-ordination on this occasion
tossed up, wider outside off. Opens the bat's face and slices a shot to point
full on off. Driven to Bonner at deep extra cover once again
full on off stump. Pushed back to Cornwall
slower through the air. Full on off, and he pushes it to mid on
full, on middle. Comes down the track and drives to mid on
full on off stump. Lunges forward and defends it to the bowler
full, just outside off stump. Defended
full, on off stump. Blocked off the front foot. Is that the last over from this end? Probably
full just outside off. Driven to cover
full on middle. Defends off the front foot, hitting it back to Warrican
full just outside off. Turns a bit more, and through to the keeper. No shot offered
good length, outside off. Steps back and cuts. Finds point
tossed up, nearly a yorker. Toe-ends a drive to mid off
full, just outside off. Driven to cover. Stumps
back of a length, extra bounce angling into the batsman. Gloved
good length, just outside off stump. Pokes at it, guides it to point
fullish, just outside off. Covers the stumps and shoulders his arms
full outside off. Presses forward, and defends towards point
fullish, just a little wide. Left alone
drilled! Overpitches, just outside off, and Mithun lunges forward before driving through the gap between cover and cover point for four
tossed up on middle. Drives to mid off
full on middle and leg. Nudged off the back foot to short leg
defends it back
tossed up on middle. He gets inside the line of the ball, and drives to cover
full on middle and leg. Lunges forward to defend
yorker length, on leg. Digs it leg-side with the bat's closed face
good length, just outside off stump. Rides the bounce and fends it from near his chest
back of a length, on middle. Ducks swiftly under the line
goes short again as this length ball on middle and leg, goes through to Da Silva. Mithun happy to duck one more time
back of a length on middle, forcing Mithun to duck again. Batsman looks at the square-leg umpire to see if he gives it a no-ball, and he does, but that's for overstepping. Not for the short ball
back of a length, on off and seaming into him. Doesn't duck, chooses to defend instead. Brings the bat near his face, and the ball rattles the handle
good length, outside off. Pokes at it, edges it to gully, who dives to his left to stop the ball on the bounce
good length, on middle and leg. Flicked to short fine leg
full on middle and leg. Whipped off his toes to deep midwicket for four
full outside off stump. Defended towards cover
yorker length, on off. Mistimes the drive to the bowler
good length, just outside off. Opens the bat's face and guides it to third man
full, just outside off stump. Presses forward to block
full toss, just outside off. Driven to mid off
good length, just outside off. Opens the bat's face and taps it to point for a quick run
full, on off stump. Defended off the front foot, back to the bowler. Another front-foot no ball
full just outside off. Mushfiqur takes a tiny stride forward, stays well balanced, and checks a drive past cover's left for another boundary. Pure timing
good length outside off and angling into off stump. Defended off the back foot towards cover point. Overstepped again
fullish, just outside off and angling in. Mushfiqur covers his stumps, and shoulders his arms

full and just outside off stump. Tries to drive to mid off, but it comes off the bat's inside half instead. Rolls past the stumps, past the mid-on region. Fielder at mid off has to run diagonally towards long on to stop the four
full on middle stump. Defended after pressing forward
full on middle. Closes the bat's face and nudges it to midwicket
full, on middle. Defended
good length, just outside off. Goes deep and cuts to deep point
full, on off. Drives square, past the infield, and the fielder at deep point has to run across to cut it off
full, just outside off. He shuffles beyond the stumps and then shows some whippage to convert it into a full toss and drill it to deep midwicket for four
full, just outside off stump. Driven to cover. Now the spinner has overstepped
full outside off stump. Turning away, and pushed to mid off
full outside off, and tries to drive. Misses out
full on middle stump. Steps across to the off stump, and defends to mid on
full on leg. Tries to flick behind square but the ball goes past the pads to the keeper
full, on middle, and going a bit down the leg side. Misses the flick, and the keeper misfields
full on middle. Defended towards mid off
full, on middle,  and going down the leg side
good length, on middle. Ducks under it
full, on off stump. Presses forward to defend
caressed to mid on for one, and that's his fifty! Looks upwards to enjoy the moment
full outside off stump. Mistimes a drive to short cover
shouts of catch it but just beyond the lone infielder on the leg side (midwicket). Full outside off, comes down the wicket and hits it over midwicket for four. Good use of his feet
full, just outside off stump. Defended
full on middle. Worked with the turn to the leg side
fullish, just outside off. Pushed off the front foot to cover
turns this full ball off his pads to the leg side
good length, on off. Gets across in front of the stumps, and nudges it to cover
full, just outside off stump. Defended, off the front foot
good length, just outside off stump. Shoulders his arms
full on middle and leg stump. Flicked, behind square, off his toes

excellent field placement! Short midwicket comes into play. Full ball just outside off, and he whips it off his pads. But mistimes the shot, ball goes in the air, and Kraigg Brathwaite dives to his right to take a diving catch. Umpire Saikat wants to confirm if the catch was clean or not, so asks the TV umpire. His soft signal is out and replays confirm it. Mithun's 86-ball vigil comes to a close
full, on off. Defended with soft hands to the leg side. Ensuring the ball goes along the ground
full just outside off stump. Blocked away to cover
good length, on middle and leg. Gets off the mark by working this off his pads to deep backward square
full on middle, and turning down leg. Liton looks to pad it away, and it hits the front leg
nearly taken at short leg! Overptiched on middle, and he tries to whip it. Nearly goes straight into the hands of the fielder under the helmet. Excellent over from Cornwall
good length, just outside off stump. Defends after shuffling across, playing off the back foot
excellent fielding from Mayers as this ball is clipped to square leg. But Mayers races to his right, dives full length, and stops the ball from going for more runs
good length, just outside off. Opens the bat's face and runs it down to point
full on middle and leg. Flicked to fine leg for four. Races away, played with the delivery's angle
good length, just outside off. Worked to point
yorker length, on off. Dug away to the leg side

full on off, and swept leg side. Hits Shayne Moseley - at short leg - on the hand. And the physio is needed! Lots of bones on the hand, so hopefully nothing is broken. The delay also means that the umpires have called drinks
tossed up, and he defends with a forward press

this could be gone! He's gone across the line with the sweep, but it's not been given out. They review immediately! Smart bowling from Cornwall, who fires this in a touch quicker. Mushfiqur almost pre-meditates the sweep. There's no bat on this, with the ball having slipped way lower than where his bat is. The impact stays on umpire's call, and that's what saves Mushfiqur Rahim. Wow, quite a reprieve for the key batsman here
length, presses forward to defend
length, sharp turn back in, as Rahim presses forward to defend
length, starts around middle, and he goes back to place this along the ground, just to the left of the leg slip in place
fullish length, punched back towards mid-on
length, outside off, stretches forward to block it
length, on to the pads, and works this away through the deep backward square leg region. Sensational timing on that, as it just keeps running away!
length, and he jabs this off the back foot towards point
length, defended to point
short, outside off, and he can ignore this
a little shorter in length, and he looks to pull initially, but then gets surprised by the bounce, and almost plays it to leg slip. Just gets it past him, and through to fine leg. What a close call

oh dear, what have you done here, Mushfiqur? It's again a defensively bowled delivery, just a tad short in length, and he goes for the reverse sweep. Goes off the toe-end, and it almost loops in slow motion towards short cover. The West Indies players let out whoops of joy as the catch is collected. Cornwall is a hero. He's accounted for both overnight batsmen, by inducing errors. Rahim has to drag himself away!
length, and he goes back to nurdle this away towards deep square leg
defended off the back foot
this has been eased with the spin towards square leg
defends after getting behind the line
dug in a bit short, and he gets beside the line to work it away towards fine leg
slower ball, floated right up towards leg, and he defends towards square leg
defended towards short midwicket
fullish, faster at 143.8 kph, and just flicks his thigh pad on its way through to Da Silva. He was looking to flick it away, with the line just slanting down leg
length, cuts back in off the surface, and he defends on the hop. Off the inner part of the bat, goes away towards short midwicket
full, down leg side, and he works it fine. Da Silva dives across but cannot stop it. Perhaps a deliberate ploy, but well played in the end
length, and he goes back to work it with the turn towards deep backward square leg
worked away with the turn towards deep backward square leg
tossed up, a bit of drift away, and it beats the outside edge, as Liton stretches forward to defend
fuller, driven with the turn towards short mid-wicket
goes back and works this towards deep square leg
fullish, driven back towards the bowler, to his right
length, and he hangs back to work it away with the incoming angle, towards long leg
bit short, just outside off, and he ducks under this. Leaves the periscope up, though, which he would be advised not to
good length, shapes back in after pitching, and he is forced to defend this towards point
back of a length, goes back to punch this towards extra cover
back of a length, good pace at 139 kph, angles into him, tucking him up. Defended from the crease
full, a bit of reverse swing perhaps, as it tails in. Defended towards mid-on
length, and he goes back to defend this
length, around off, and he presses forward to defend
length, presses forward to defend again
length, defended with a push towards short cover
presses forward to defend one closer to him
fuller, worked away with the turn towards deep mid-wicket
starts with a gentle half-volley outside off. Driven firmly, but straight to cover
just draws the length back a bit. Bowled at 135 kph, angles across him from outside off. Mehidy looks to punch through cover, but is beaten
just a bit short again, angles back in from outside off. Mehidy again wants to take this on. Tries to play the steer towards third man, but is beaten again
fuller, and outside off, driven towards point
length, driven towards cover-point, off the back foot
length, wide outside off, tempts him into the square drive. Cannot beat cover-point, though
length, presses forward to defend
length, around off, and he defends with a forward press
length, works this away towards deep backward square leg
length, stretches forward to defend
drops this a tad short, and he goes back to cut this away through the vacant point region
fuller, driven with the turn towards mid-wicket, where Bonner cuts this off
full, down leg, and worked away to the left of long leg
fuller length, around off, and he defends with a forward press
fuller, around off, and left alone
fuller, straighter, and driven with the angle towards mid-on
length, around off, a bit of tail back in, but he is well forward to drive towards mid-off
a searing yorker, at 141kph, starts from outside off, and reverses back in. He defends, and he has overstepped
fuller, straighter, and he defends
length, presses forward to defend this
fullish length, and he goes back to defend this
presses forward to defend one around off
goes back and works this with the turn towards mid-wicket
floated up a touch fuller, and he goes back to dab this towards point. No turn on this, and it beats the outside edge. Great collection by Da Silva
length, around off, and he goes back to defend this
starts with a short, wide delivery. Liton hangs back and then guides this through the backward point area
length, defends with a forward press
presses forward and smothers one outside off
flighted closer to the batsman. Bowled at about 78 kph, and he has ample time to go back and defend
presses forward to defend one closer to him in length
length, turns across him, and he drives to point
length, driven back towards the bowler
works this away towards deep square leg
length, goes back to meet it with a dead bat
fuller, defended with a little forward press
presses forward to a straighter ball, on a good length, and smothers it
length, goes back and works it away towards deep square leg
length, driven back towards the bowler
goes back and cuts this away towards point. A little misfield will allow an easy single
tossed up, goes close to off, and he defends from the crease
length, and a big stride forward to smother this from Mehidy
full, driven towards cover
goes back to drive this towards cover-point
worked behind square on the leg side for a couple
length ball on off and turning in. Nudged to square leg
full just outside off stump. Presses forward to defend
full on middle, and turning down leg. Padded away
good length, just outside off stump. Defended off the back foot towards cover
fullish, just outside off stump. Defended
full, on off stump. Lunges forward to block to short mid off
fullish, just outside off. But Miraz goes deep and cuts it behind point for four. Smart from Mehidy, who changed the length thanks to his footwork
full outside off stump. Caressed to cover point, and he calls early for the one
full outside off and turning away. Left alone
left alone
full just outside off, and tapped to cover point
full on middle. Nudged to the leg side
full just outside off. Comes down the ground and drives to long on
full on off, and swept to deep backward square leg
good length ball outside off. Defended off the back foot
good length, on middle. Flicked towards leg slip, on the bounce
full on leg stump. Mistimes the flick to the right of the non-striker. Bowler scurries across to stop the one
full on off. And he tries to drive. Brings short mid off in play
full, on off. Big stride forward to defend with soft hands
full on off. A bit loopy on this occasion. Drives inside out, with the turn, to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
fullish, on middle and leg. Nudged to short midwicket
full on middle stump. Defended back, towards the non-striker
overpitched on middle and leg. Works it to wide long on. A misfield in the deep allows them to come for a second
good length, just outside off stump. Defended off the back foot
good length, just outside off stump. Goes onto the back foot. Defended
full, on off and skidding through. Blocked off the back foot
good length, just outside off. Tries to defend off the back foot, but the ball takes the edge, hits the deck, and nearly bounces onto the stumps
tossed up, outside off, and he takes his front foot across the stumps, before playing a crisp flick over the infield. Big gaps at deep midwicket, and that's four more for Liton
full on middle and leg. Worked off his toes to deep backward square. Man at fine leg has some work to do
full, on middle and off. Drives with the straight bat to long off
full, on off stump. Driven down the ground to long off again
full on off, and driven inside-out to extra cover. Overstepped
full on off stump. Defended
full on off stump. Caresses a drive to extra cover
full ball on middle, and blocked off the front foot
loopy ball, just outside off and turning in. Fended with soft hands
full, on off. Flicked to the fielder at midwicket
full, on his toes in front of off stump. Worked to midwicket again
full, just outside off. Bit of turn inwards. Blocked to the leg side
full, just outside off. Defended with the turn
fullish, just outside off. Goes onto the back foot and taps it to point
full on middle. Worked against the turn to the leg side
good length, wider outside off. Through to Da Silva
full, on off. Big stride forward, and blocked back to the bowler
length ball, flicked to the leg side
full, wider outside off. Invites him to drive, and he crunches it. Bonner dives, gets a hand to it, but a bit slow to get up and retrieve it
nudged away towards midwicket, to the gap, allowing them to take the run
full, on leg. Worked towards cover point
full on off stump. Gently pushed to deep midwicket for one
fullish, on off stump. Worked off his pads to square leg off the back foot
good length, just outside off stump. Turning in, and fended off the back foot
full on middle. Big stride forward, and flicks off his pads to midwicket
good length on off. Turning in, and he goes on the back foot. Flicked to deep midwicket off the back foot. Follow on avoided with ease in the end
fullish, on off, and he's early to flick leg side. Hits the inside-edge of the bat with the handle turning in his hand. Flies towards midwicket
fullish, on off. Shuffles across, and fends it standing tall to the leg side
full, just outside off but coming inwards. Crunches a drive past the bowler, offering the full face of the bat, and mid-off gives it a futile chase. That was a very good looking shot!
fullish, on off. And he dead-bats towards mid on
good length on off and angling into middle and leg. Defends off the back foot towards the leg side
yorker length, on off. Dug away, quite comfortably despite the ball moving inwards
full, on off stump. Flicked off his toes to wide long on
full on off stump. Blocked off the front foot on this occasion
tossed up, just outside off stump. Defended after a giant lunge forward

oh is that dropped? Bonner under the helmet at leg slip. This was overpitched on leg. Batsman tries to sweep, and leg slip sticks his right hand out to take a catch. Hits the palm and falls on the ground. On another day it could've gone in the air for the keeper or short leg to take the rebound catch. Not today
full, on off. Defended
fuller. On off stump. Defended back to Cornwall
back of a length, on off. Comfortably rides the bounce and pulls to deep midwicket along the ground
shorter, on off stump. Ducks under the line of the delivery
back of a length on middle and leg. Ducks under swiftly
back of a length on middle and leg. Rides the bounce and fends off the back foot
the short-ball barrage continues from around the stumps. Ducks after spotting the length early
yorker length, wide outside leg. Clipped away, past the square-leg umpire for four. Fine leg tried to cut it off but in vain
full on middle. Tries to work it leg side, and shouts of 'catch it' as the ball goes just past the man lurking at short leg
defended
full on off. He goes onto the back foot while the ball is in the air. Defended with the full face of the bat
full on middle. Swept past the diving backward short leg fielder. Intercepted by fine leg
chance as he flicks this length ball off the back foot. Forward short leg dived to his right, backward short leg was in place too. Went between both
full, just outside off. Worked to deep midwicket
good length on middle and angling towards off. Opens the bat's face and taps it to point
back of a length, just outside the leg stump line. He ducks, and through to Da Silva
back of a length on leg stump, and Miraz ducks once more
good length, on middle and leg. Worked off his hips to deep midwicket
short ball on leg stump. This one doesn't bounce as much as what Liton thought. He ducks, but the ball just about goes over the stumps!
good length, outside leg. Swivels, and checks a pull to fine leg. Moves to 43
good length outside off. Turning away. Enough time to rock back, and places the cut well, past point for four
length ball, closer to his body this time. But he adjusts well, plays the cut late, gets the four to deep point. And that's his 7th Test fifty! Third one against West Indies
full just outside off stump. Goes through to the keeper
full outside off. Turning away, quite a lot of spin. Left alone
fullish, on middle. Turning towards off. Worked off the back foot to midwicket
full on off. Defended back
full toss, on leg stump. Nudged to the leg side
good length, on middle. Flicked away to deep backward square
full, on middle and leg. Flicked, tentatively, past short leg to midwicket
tossed up, outside leg. Swept to fine leg. Might have come off the pad, so we'll wait for the umpire's adjudication. Bat first he confirms
tossed up, just outside off. Mistimes a drive back to the bowler
full, on off stump. Defended towards cover
length, drives towards point. A diving stop there prevents runs
fuller, wider of off, and he leaves. Da Silva has a good laugh as he collects
tossed up closer to him, and he drives with the turn towards extra cover. Sweeper in the deep fields
short, and he goes back to cut, but cannot beat point
length, and he goes back to drive this towards deep extra cover
tossed up, around off, turning further away. Left alone
tossed up, around leg, and he sweeps this behind square towards long leg
length ball, turns back in from around off, but enough time for him to go back and block it
length, goes back to work it towards long leg
length, but really slow through the air. Bowled at just 63.4 kph, and he can go back to cut this away towards deep point
goes all the way back to defend a length ball outside off, turning back in
flighted closer to the bat, and he drives through the mid-wicket region to a sweeper in the deep
length, turns away, and he cuts to point
short, wide and he goes back to cut this towards deep point. Some swift running and they pick up the second
drives a fuller ball towards deep extra cover
length, and he goes back to drive this with the turn towards deep point
drives with the turn, pressing forward, towards wide cover
length, hangs back and drives with the turn towards long-off
length, but down the leg side, and he can work this off his pads towards long leg
length, a bit of extra bounce as it shapes back into him. He plays it off the inside, and nearly chops it down to his stumps. Goes towards fine leg, though
short, but down the leg side, and that will bring up the hundred of this partnership
fullish, around off, and he plays a spanking cover drive. Along the ground to short cover, though
back of a length, angles in, and he defends with bat close to body
length, around off, and he defends from the crease as it seams in a touch towards him
length, around off, and slow enough to allow him to rock back and cut this away to gully
short, and he cuts this away to the sweeper at backward point
length, around off, driven to mid-off
length, and he defends
dug in short, a bit down the leg side, and he leaves
length, and he goes back to defend this. Angled in from outside off, and he gets nicely behind the line of it
fuller length, driven firmly, but straight towards a short extra cover in place
length, around off, defended
short, and he hops to guide this towards backward point. Great stop by Bonner in that position, otherwise, this would have run away for four
short, into his body from outside off, and he can drop this towards deep square leg
full toss, around off, and he drives to mid-off
short, outside off, and he looks to have a poke. No foot movement, and he ends up getting beaten. Better line from Gabriel, but he can afford to go fuller with the new red cherry
fuller, around off, and he presses forward to defend. A bit of movement back in, but he covers that well
short in length, and he can go back and drive this towards deep point
short, and he has a swish at that. Looking for the hook, but misses that by a fair distance. Well-directed by Mayers, which makes up for the relative lack of pace
length, and he goes back to work this away with the incoming slant, towards deep square leg
fuller, around leg, driven firmly, but fielded at mid-on
length, around off, defended from the crease
fuller, driven firmly, but towards wide mid-off
impressive! Dug in short, and he bends with an initial intent to sway out of the way. Sees there is some width on offer, and then just guides it over the slips cordon
length, and he defends this from the crease after getting behind the line
short of a length, outside off, and he looks to drive this off the back foot. Beaten again, and Gabriel follows up with a glare at the batsman
looks for the yorker, but ends up bowling a low full toss. Driven towards cover
short, and he ducks out of the way. Down on the ground, and sports a smile as Gabriel looks on
fullish length, and angles into him. He flicks this away through the square leg region. Picks up three, and brings up his fifty!
length, around leg, and he works this towards short mid-wicket
length, and he presses forward to defend
a bit short, seams away, and he looks to cut this away. Beaten
length, outside off, and he looks to cut, but misses out
back of a length, closer to off, and he hops to defend this
length, and he goes back to defend towards point
length, zips in from around off and middle, and he is squared up in defence. Goes away towards gully
just a bit short in length. He goes back to dab it to gully
yorker, but comfortably defended towards gully
fullish, around the pads, and he works this away off his hips towards deep backward square leg
length, around off, angling in, and he defends
short, and he ducks underneath this
length, around off, turning in, and defended with the turn and with soft hands
what a ball! Pitched outside off, and he played for the turn. Goes straight through, past the outside edge
works this with the turn towards deep square leg
hangs back and defends towards short mid-wicket
close to him, just outside off, and he looks to run this towards third man. Beats the outside edge yet again
goes back and punches this back towards the bowler
what a start to the session as this full ball, on off stump, brings out the forward push from Liton. Past the umpire, past the non-striker, and past mid on
back of a length, with Gabriel bowling from around the stumps. Lands on leg. Batsman tiptoes and nudges it leg side
good length on middle and leg. Nudged off the back foot towards midwicket, and off they go for a quick run
good length, just outside leg. Uncomfortably tapped off his hips past square leg
back of a length, just outside leg stump. Ducks halfway down, gets out of the ball's way
good length ball on middle. And angling across past off stump. Tries to cut, but beaten by the extra pace. Late to the shot, through to Da Silva
full on off. Turning in, and pushed to the leg side
full on off, and he taps it off the front foot to short midwicket
full, on off. Gets to the pitch of the ball, and drives towards the non striker. Cornwall moves to his right to stop
full, just outside off. Defends off the front foot. Ball flies off the edge to the gap at point
length ball on middle. Tapped leg side
another length ball on middle, and flicked off the back foot to the leg side

just short of the diving Cornwall! Back of a length, from around the stumps, and angling towards off stump. Hits the glove and the ball pops in the air. Cornwall from point dives forward, but it falls just short of him
back of a length, on middle and off. Ducks
back of a length, outside leg stump. No shot offered, and the ball goes down the leg side. Keeper dives to his left, and manages to get a hand to it
back of a length on middle, and angling away from Miraz. He tries to flash a cut over point but can't connect. Gabriel has a chat with Miraz after that attempted shot
back of a length on leg stump. Miraz ducks under, looking away from the bowler. Turns his head to Gabriel only after the bowler has turned around to go to his mark
